怎一個愁字了得.pinyin: zen3 yi1 ge4 chou2 zi4 liao3 de2
怎一個愁字了得.definition: (last line of the poem 聲聲慢|声声慢[Sheng1 sheng1 Man4] by Song poet Li Qingzhao 李清照[Li3 Qing1 zhao4]); how can it be expressed in one word, "sorrow"?; how can words express such sadness?

怎麼了.definition: What's up?; What's going on?; What happened?

怎麼回事.definition: what's the matter?; what's going on?; how could that be?; how did that come about?; what's it all about?

怎麼得了.definition: how can this be?; what's to be done?; what an awful mess!

怎麼搞的.definition: How did it happen?; What's wrong?; What went wrong?; What's up?

怎麼樣.definition: how?; how about?; how was it?; how are things?

怎麼著.definition: what?; how?; how about?; whatever; also pr. [zen3 me5 zhe5]

怎麽.definition: variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

怎麽了.definition: variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
